price: 31. Nabii Nuuc mari finqteek lakat aka hora ginne (Qaad dcqsita тага kinnuk).
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
